pr_title: MINOR: Log warn message with details when there's kerberos login issue

timeline.message: log warn message when there's kerberos login exception, though we will still retry

timeline.bodyText:
@cnZach Looks like the intention was to print out the exception with stack trace? You would want to use:
public void warn(String msg, Throwable t);
timeline.author: rajinisivaram

replies.bodyText: Hi @rajinisivaram , do you mean we should use  log.warn(s"[Principal=$principal]: Error when trying to renew with TicketCache, but will retry ", e);  ?
replies.author: cnZach

replies.bodyText: slf4j logger methods logs exception if the last argument is throwable. so this is fine.
replies.author: omkreddy
